name: pearl
short_effect: Sell for 700 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 1400 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: A pretty pearl. Can be sold cheaply.
flavor_text.emerald: A pretty pearl that would sell at a cheap price.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A relatively small pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold cheaply.
